item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description: Fall 2021 10/5/21 - “Graphical Models and Logical Abstractions for Quantum Systems, Yipeng Huang (Rutgers), @yipenghuang0302, recording 10/12/21 - “Electronic Design Automation and Network Security, Riadul Islam (UMBC), recording 10/19/21 - “Managing Memory Smartly”, Jason Lowe-Power (UC Davis), @jlowepower, talk details, recording 10/26/21 - “Chisel 3.5”, Jack Koenig (SiFive), @jackakattack 11/9/21 - “Energy Efficient Computing for Intelligence at the Edge of the Network in the CMOS Era and Beyond”, Siddarth Joshi (Notre Dame), @s14joshi, recording
